items.subject: Review and Update Employee Communication Strategy
items.description:
Review and update the **internal employee communication strategy**.

* **Channels:**
    * Email newsletters
    * Intranet portal
    * Team meetings
    * Company-wide announcements

_Ensure timely, transparent, and engaging communication._ #Ref:Untitled.jpg

items.subject: Organize Corporate Social Responsibility Event
items.description:
Organize a **corporate social responsibility (CSR) event**.

* **Ideas:**
    * Environmental cleanup drive
    * Charity fundraiser walk/run
    * Mentorship program with local schools

_Strengthen community ties and brand image._

items.subject: Prepare Annual Shareholder Report
items.description:
Prepare the **annual shareholder report** for the upcoming fiscal year meeting.

* **Sections:**
    * CEO's letter
    * Financial highlights
    * Operational review
    * Corporate governance

_Ensure transparency and compliance with reporting standards._

items.subject: Review and Update IT Asset Management Policy
items.description:
Review and update the **IT asset management policy**.

* **Areas:**
    * Procurement procedures
    * Asset tracking and inventory
    * Disposal and decommissioning

_Ensure accurate record-keeping and lifecycle management._

items.subject: Conduct Employee Wellness Workshop
items.description:
Organize and conduct an **employee wellness workshop** focused on stress management.

* **Topics:**
    * Mindfulness techniques
    * Time management for stress reduction
    * Importance of breaks and work-life balance

_Provide practical tools and strategies._

items.subject: Review and Update Company Website SEO
items.description:
Review and update the **company website's SEO strategy** for improved search rankings.

* **Areas:**
    * Keyword research
    * On-page optimization (titles, meta descriptions)
    * Technical SEO (site speed, mobile-friendliness)
    * Backlink building

_Aim for top 3 rankings for key keywords._

items.subject: Conduct Usability Testing for New Feature
items.description:
Conduct **usability testing** for the newly developed 'Advanced Search' feature.

* **Tasks:**
    * Recruit participants
    * Develop test scenarios
    * Facilitate testing sessions
    * Analyze user behavior and feedback

_Identify pain points and areas for improvement._

items.subject: Review and Optimize Supply Chain Logistics
items.description:
Review and optimize **supply chain logistics** to improve efficiency and reduce costs.

* **Areas:**
    * Inventory management
    * Transportation routes
    * Warehouse operations

_Identify bottlenecks and opportunities for automation._

items.subject: Develop New Employee Recognition Program
items.description:
Develop and launch a **new employee recognition program** to boost morale.

* **Ideas:**
    * Peer-to-peer recognition platform
    * Monthly 'Employee of the Month' awards
    * Service milestone celebrations

_Foster a culture of appreciation and high performance._

items.subject: Review Q2 Financial Performance
items.description:
Review the **company's financial performance for Q2 2025**.

* **Key financial statements:**
    * Income Statement
    * Balance Sheet
    * Cash Flow Statement

_Prepare summary report for management._

items.subject: Update Server OS and Applications
items.description:
Plan and execute **operating system and application updates** on production servers.

* **Servers:**
    * Web servers (Ubuntu)
    * Database servers (CentOS)
* **Applications:**
    * NGINX
    * PostgreSQL

_Schedule during maintenance window to minimize downtime._

items.subject: Review Financial Investment Portfolio
items.description:
Review the **company's financial investment portfolio** and assess performance.

* **Metrics:**
    * Return on investment (ROI)
    * Risk exposure
    * Diversification strategy

_Make recommendations for adjustments._

items.subject: Evaluate New HR Software
items.description:
Research and evaluate **new HR software solutions** to streamline HR operations.

* **Modules:**
    * Payroll
    * Recruitment
    * Performance management
    * Time and attendance

_Aim for an integrated and user-friendly system._

items.subject: Design New Product Packaging
items.description:
Design **new packaging for the upcoming product launch**.

* **Considerations:**
    * Brand consistency
    * Sustainability of materials
    * Cost-effectiveness
    * Retail appeal

_Create mockups for review._

items.subject: Update Employee Code of Conduct
items.description:
Update the **employee code of conduct** to reflect remote work policies and digital ethics.

* **Key updates:**
    * Remote work etiquette
    * Social media guidelines
    * Data security responsibilities

_Communicate changes clearly to all employees._

items.subject: Research and Implement New Payment Gateway
items.description:
Research and implement a **new payment gateway** for e-commerce platform.

* **Criteria:**
    * Transaction fees
    * Security features (PCI DSS compliance)
    * Supported payment methods
    * Integration complexity

_Aim for lower fees and better customer experience._

items.subject: Automate Data Reporting Process
items.description:
Automate the **monthly data reporting process** for marketing and sales.

* **Tools to use:**
    * BI Dashboard (Tableau, Power BI)
    * Scripting (Python)

_Reduce manual effort and ensure timely reports._

items.subject: Plan Company-Wide Training Day
items.description:
Plan a **company-wide training day** focusing on professional development.

* **Topics:**
    * Leadership skills
    * Communication effectiveness
    * Time management

_Bring in external speakers for fresh perspectives._

items.subject: Review and Update
items.description:
Review and update the **employee benefits package** for the upcoming year.

* **Benefits to evaluate:**
    * Health, dental, vision insurance
    * 401(k) matching
    * Paid time off (PTO)
    * Wellness programs

_Gather employee feedback and market benchmarks._

items.subject: Implement Automated Testing Framework
items.description:
Implement an **automated testing framework** for the frontend application.

* **Frameworks to consider:**
    * Cypress
    * Playwright
    * Selenium

_Increase test coverage and reduce manual testing effort._

items.subject: Conduct Employee Satisfaction Survey
items.description:
Design and distribute an **employee satisfaction survey**.

* **Areas to cover:**
    * Work environment
    * Management effectiveness
    * Opportunities for growth

_Gather feedback to improve workplace morale._

items.subject: Research and Select New Project Management Software
items.description:
Research and select a **new project management software** solution for the engineering department.

* **Requirements:**
    * Agile support (Scrum, Kanban)
    * Integration with Git
    * Reporting and analytics

_Conduct demos and gather team feedback._

items.subject: Review and Update Data Retention Policy
items.description:
Review and update the **company's data retention policy** to ensure compliance with GDPR and other regulations.

* **Key aspects:**
    * Data categories
    * Retention periods
    * Disposal procedures

_Consult with legal and IT teams._

items.subject: Develop New On-Demand Training Content
items.description:
Develop **new on-demand training content** for popular software tools.

* **Topics:**
    * Advanced Excel functions
    * PowerPoint presentation skills
    * Project management software (Jira)

_Create engaging video tutorials and practice exercises._

items.subject: Plan Customer Loyalty Program
items.description:
Plan and develop a **customer loyalty program** to improve retention.

* **Elements to include:**
    * Tiered rewards system
    * Exclusive discounts
    * Early access to new products

_Foster long-term customer relationships._

items.subject: Evaluate New CRM Features
items.description:
Evaluate the **new features of the CRM system** and assess their impact on sales and marketing workflows.

* **Features to test:**
    * Automated lead scoring
    * Enhanced reporting dashboards
    * Integration with email marketing platform

_Provide recommendations for adoption._

items.subject: Conduct Vulnerability Scan
items.description:
Conduct a **vulnerability scan** of the network infrastructure and applications.

* **Scope:**
    * External facing assets
    * Internal network devices
    * Web applications

_Prioritize and remediate critical vulnerabilities._

items.subject: Develop New Pricing Strategy
items.description:
Develop a **new pricing strategy** for the upcoming product launch.

* **Factors to consider:**
    * Competitor pricing
    * Value proposition
    * Cost of goods sold (COGS)
    * Target profit margins

_Aim for optimal market penetration and profitability._

items.subject: Review Social Media Engagement Metrics
items.description:
Review **social media engagement metrics** for the past quarter.

* **Metrics to analyze:**
    * Reach and impressions
    * Engagement rate (likes, comments, shares)
    * Follower growth
    * Traffic to website from social media

_Identify successful content and areas for improvement._

items.subject: Develop New Employee Onboarding Module
items.description:
Develop an **interactive onboarding module** for new hires.

* **Content:**
    * Company culture and values
    * Key departmental overviews
    * System access and tools

_Aim for an engaging and informative experience._

items.subject: Update IT Security Policies
items.description:
Update and distribute the **IT security policies** to reflect current threats and best practices.

* **Policies to revise:**
    * Password policy
    * Acceptable Use Policy
    * Data Classification Policy

_Ensure compliance with industry standards._

items.subject: Review Compensation and Benefits Structure
items.description:
Review and potentially adjust the **compensation and benefits structure**.

* **Areas of focus:**
    * Salary benchmarks
    * Health insurance plans
    * Retirement benefits
    * Employee perks

_Ensure competitiveness and fairness._

items.subject: Develop Content for Email Newsletter
items.description:
Develop compelling **content for the monthly email newsletter**.

* **Sections:**
    * Company news
    * Product updates
    * Blog highlights
    * Customer success stories

_Maintain a consistent brand voice._

items.subject: Review and Update Disaster Recovery Plan
items.description:
Review and update the **disaster recovery plan (DRP)** for critical systems.

* **Components:**
    * Recovery Time Objective (RTO)
    * Recovery Point Objective (RPO)
    * Communication protocols during disaster

_Conduct a simulation exercise after updates._

items.subject: Plan Succession for Key Roles
items.description:
Develop a **succession plan** for key leadership roles within the organization.
 #Ref:Untitled.jpg 
* **Steps:**
    * Identify critical roles
    * Assess high-potential employees
    * Develop talent pipelines

_Ensure business continuity and leadership stability._

items.subject: Review Quarterly Sales Performance
items.description:
Review the **quarterly sales performance** report for Q2 2025.

* **Metrics:**
    * Total revenue
    * New client acquisition
    * Average deal size
    * Regional performance

_Identify top performers and areas for improvement._

items.subject: Setup New Project Repository
items.description:
Set up a **new project repository** on GitHub for the 'Aurora' project.

* **Tasks:**
    * Create repository
    * Configure branch protection rules
    * Add team members with appropriate permissions
    * Set up CI/CD pipeline integration

_Ensure secure and efficient code management._

items.subject: Update Brand Guidelines
items.description:
Update and distribute the **company's brand guidelines**.

* **Sections to revise:**
    * Logo usage
    * Typography standards
    * Color palette
    * Tone of voice

_Ensure consistency across all brand touchpoints._

items.subject: Research New Technology
items.description:
Research **emerging technology trends** relevant to our industry for future product development.

* **Areas:**
    * Quantum Computing
    * Web3
    * Advanced Robotics

_Identify potential applications and business impact._

items.subject: Optimize Website Loading Speed
items.description:
Optimize **website loading speed** to improve user experience and SEO rankings.

* **Techniques:**
    * Image optimization
    * Minify CSS/JavaScript
    * Leverage browser caching
    * Server response time optimization

_Target a loading speed under 2 seconds._

items.subject: Conduct Employee Engagement Survey
items.description:
Design and deploy the **annual employee engagement survey**.

* **Focus areas:**
    * Job satisfaction
    * Work-life balance
    * Career development opportunities

_Analyze results and create action plans._

items.subject: Review Legal Contracts Template
items.description:
Review and update the **standard legal contracts template**.

* **Contract types:**
    * Client agreements
    * Vendor agreements
    * Employment contracts

_Ensure all clauses are up-to-date with current legislation._

items.subject: Conduct Vendor Security Assessments
items.description:
Conduct **security assessments** for all new third-party vendors.

* **Checks:**
    * Data privacy practices
    * Security certifications (ISO 27001, SOC 2)
    * Incident response capabilities

_Mitigate supply chain risks._

items.subject: Plan Q3 Product Roadmap
items.description:
Plan the **product roadmap for Q3 2025**.

* **Key features to include:**
    * Feature A (high priority)
    * Feature B (medium priority)
    * Bug fixes and performance improvements

_Align with business objectives and market demand._

items.subject: Review and Optimize Marketing Funnel
items.description:
Review and optimize the **marketing funnel** to improve conversion rates.

* **Stages to analyze:**
    * Awareness
    * Interest
    * Consideration
    * Conversion
    * Retention

_Identify bottlenecks and propose solutions._

items.subject: Conduct Security Awareness Training
items.description:
Conduct **mandatory security awareness training** for all employees.

* **Topics:**
    * Phishing and social engineering
    * Password security
    * Data handling and privacy

_Ensure 100% attendance._

items.subject: Research Competitor Pricing Models
items.description:
Research and analyze **competitor pricing models** to inform our strategy.

* **Competitors:**
    * Company X
    * Company Y
    * Company Z

_Identify best practices and potential pricing gaps._

fields.name: competitorList
fields.label: Competitor List (comma-separated)
fields.default: Company X, Company Y, Company Z

data.competitorList: Company X, Company Y, Company Z

items.subject: Plan Company Holiday Party
items.description:
Plan the **annual company holiday party**.

* **Tasks:**
    * Venue booking
    * Catering selection
    * Entertainment arrangements
    * Guest list management

_Make it a festive and memorable event!_

items.subject: Review Customer Support Tickets
items.description:
Review a sample of **customer support tickets** to identify common issues and areas for improvement.

* **Focus on:**
    * Resolution time
    * Customer satisfaction scores
    * Recurring problems

_Provide actionable insights to the support team._

items.subject: Develop API Documentation
items.description:
Create comprehensive **API documentation** for the new public API endpoints.

* **Sections:**
    * Authentication
    * Endpoint details (methods, parameters)
    * Request/response examples
    * Error codes

_Use tools like Swagger/OpenAPI._

items.subject: Website Accessibility Audit
items.description:
Conduct a **website accessibility audit** to ensure WCAG 2.1 compliance.

* **Areas to check:**
    * Keyboard navigation
    * Screen reader compatibility
    * Color contrast
    * Alt text for images

_Generate a report with recommendations for developers._

items.subject: Plan Employee Volunteer Day
items.description:
Plan the **annual employee volunteer day**.

* **Activities to consider:**
    * Local park cleanup
    * Food bank support
    * Community garden maintenance

_Promote corporate social responsibility._

items.subject: Optimize Cloud Storage Costs
items.description:
Optimize **cloud storage costs** by identifying and deleting unused or outdated data.

* **Cloud provider:** AWS S3
* **Tasks:**
    * Identify stale data
    * Implement lifecycle policies
    * Review storage classes

_Aim for a 10% reduction in monthly storage bills._

fields.name: storageService
fields.label: Cloud Storage Service
fields.options: AWS S3,Azure Blob Storage,Google Cloud Storage

items.subject: Conduct Market Research for New Product
items.description:
Conduct **in-depth market research** for a potential new product line.

* **Methods:**
    * Surveys
    * Focus groups
    * Competitor analysis

_Identify market demand and competitive landscape._

items.subject: Design User Onboarding Flow
items.description:
Design and prototype the **new user onboarding flow** for the mobile application.

* **Phases:**
    * Sign-up
    * Profile setup
    * First feature interaction

_Focus on intuitive and engaging experience._

items.subject: Recruit Senior Software Engineer
items.description:
Initiate the **recruitment process** for a Senior Software Engineer.

* **Tasks:**
    * Job description refinement
    * Recruitment agency selection
    * Interview panel formation

_Aim to fill the position within 3 months._

items.subject: Review and Update Incident Response Plan
items.description:
Review and update the **IT incident response plan**.

* **Key areas:**
    * Detection and analysis
    * Containment and eradication
    * Recovery and post-incident activity

_Conduct a tabletop exercise after updates._

items.subject: Develop Investor Pitch Deck
items.description:
Develop a **compelling investor pitch deck** for the next funding round.

* **Sections:**
    * Problem statement
    * Solution and product
    * Market opportunity
    * Business model
    * Team
    * Financial projections

_Highlight key achievements and future potential._

items.subject: Coordinate Cross-Departmental Workshop
items.description:
Coordinate a **cross-departmental workshop** on innovation.

* **Participants:**
    * R&D
    * Product Development
    * Marketing

_Foster collaboration and new ideas._

items.subject: Implement Cloud Cost Optimization
items.description:
Implement strategies for **cloud cost optimization**.

* **Areas to address:**
    * Right-sizing instances
    * Reserved instances/savings plans
    * Resource tagging and monitoring

_Target a 20% reduction in cloud spend._

items.subject: Update Internal Training Manuals
items.description:
Update **internal training manuals** for the sales department.

* **Sections to update:**
    * New product features
    * Sales process changes
    * CRM system usage guide

_Ensure clear and concise instructions._

items.subject: Research AI Integration Opportunities
items.description:
Research potential **AI integration opportunities** for product enhancement.

* **Areas of interest:**
    * Customer support chatbots
    * Personalized recommendations
    * Automated data analysis

_Identify relevant vendors and technologies._

items.subject: Analyze Website Traffic Data
items.description:
Analyze **website traffic data** from Google Analytics to identify trends and insights.

* **Metrics to review:**
    * Page views
    * Bounce rate
    * Conversion funnels
    * User demographics

_Prepare a presentation for the marketing team._

items.subject: Draft Press Release for Partnership
items.description:
Draft a **press release** announcing the new strategic partnership with Tech Solutions Inc.

* **Key points:**
    * Benefits of partnership
    * Impact on customers
    * Quotes from leadership

_Target top tech publications._

items.subject: Setup New Development Environment
items.description:
Set up a **new development environment** for the upcoming project.

* **Tools to install:**
    * IDE (VS Code)
    * Docker
    * Git
    * Node.js

_Ensure all dependencies are met._

items.subject: Develop New Employee Wellness Program
items.description:
Develop and launch a **new employee wellness program**.

* **Components:**
    * Mental health support
    * Physical fitness initiatives
    * Nutrition guidance

*Promote a healthy and balanced work environment.*

items.subject: Review Legal Compliance Audit Report
items.description:
Review the **latest legal compliance audit report** and identify areas for improvement.

* **Focus areas:**
    * Data privacy (GDPR, CCPA)
    * Labor law adherence
    * Contractual obligations

_Prioritize critical findings._

items.subject: todo-demo tags
items.description:
I've used a variety of tags to categorize the tasks and create relationships between them. Here's a list of the tags you'll find in the sample data:
### General Categories
* **work**
* **personal**
* **health**
* **hobby**
* **finance**
* **leisure**
* **tech**

---

### Project & Department Specific
* **project-alpha**
* **project-beta**
* **marketing**
* **hr**
* **legal**
* **customer-success**

---

### Technical & Functional Areas
* **backend**
* **frontend**
* **api-dev**
* **ui-ux**
* **database**
* **devops**
* **automation**
* **coding**
* **documentation**
* **seo**
* **data-analysis**

---

### Specific Task Types
* **shopping**
* **family**
* **work-presentation**
* **fitness**
* **reading**
* **bills**
* **development**
* **travel**
* **household**
* **gardening**
* **cooking**
* **health-appointment**
* **market-research**
* **competitor-analysis**
* **budgeting**
* **quarterly-planning**
* **recruitment**
* **employee-management**
* **team-activities**
* **employee-engagement**
* **partnerships**
* **contract-review**
* **website-optimization**
* **performance-management**
* **employee-development**
* **content-creation**
* **thought-leadership**
* **product-improvement**
* **reporting**
* **stakeholder-communications**

---

### Form-Related Tags
These tags are used in the `tags` array and also as the `tag` value within the `userDefined` object, helping to link the task to a specific form schema.
* **form-project**
* **form-shopping**
* **form-family**
* **form-work-presentation**
* **form-fitness**
* **form-reading**
* **form-bills**
* **form-development**
* **form-travel**
* **form-household**
* **form-coding**
* **form-gardening**
* **form-cooking**
* **form-health-appointment**
* **form-tech**
* **form-design**
* **form-database**
* **form-documentation**
* **form-research**
* **form-finance**
* **form-hr**
* **form-event**
* **form-legal**
* **form-seo**
* **form-performance**
* **form-devops**
* **form-content**
* **form-feedback**
* **form-financial-report**

items.subject: Migrate Data to New CRM System
items.description:
Migrate **customer data** from the old CRM to the new system.

* **Steps:**
    * Data mapping
    * Data cleansing
    * Import and validation

*Ensure data integrity throughout the process.*

items.subject: Prepare Financial Report for Stakeholders
items.description: Compile the **monthly financial report** for **stakeholders**. Include *income statements*, *balance sheets*, and *cash flow statements*. Ensure all data is accurate and up-to-date. Present at the **next board meeting**.

items.subject: Analyze Q2 Customer Feedback
items.description: Analyze all **customer feedback** collected in **Q2**. Identify common themes, pain points, and suggestions. Prepare a summary report for the product team. Focus on feedback from *NPS surveys* and *support tickets*.

items.subject: Write Blog Post: 'Future of AI in Healthcare'
items.description: Draft a **blog post** titled '*The Future of AI in Healthcare*'. Focus on recent advancements, ethical considerations, and potential impacts. Target a **technical audience**. Due by **next Tuesday**.

items.subject: Set up CI/CD Pipeline for Microservice B
items.description: Configure the **CI/CD pipeline** for **Microservice B** using *Jenkins*. Automate *builds*, *tests*, and *deployments* to the staging environment. Coordinate with the DevOps team.

items.subject: Conduct Performance Reviews for Q2
items.description: Begin conducting **performance reviews** for all team members for **Q2**. Schedule individual meetings, gather feedback, and complete evaluation forms. All reviews must be submitted by **July 31st**.

items.subject: Optimize Website SEO for Product Pages
items.description: Implement **SEO best practices** for all **product pages**. Focus on *keyword optimization*, *meta descriptions*, and *image alt tags*. Monitor search rankings after implementation. See [SEO Guidelines 2025](https://example.com/seo-guidelines).

items.subject: Review Legal Contract for New Partnership
items.description: Thoroughly review the **legal contract** for the **new partnership agreement** with *Global Solutions Inc.* Pay close attention to clauses related to *intellectual property*, *liability*, and *termination*. Consult with legal counsel.

items.subject: Plan Team Building Event
items.description: Organize a **team-building event** for the engineering department. Explore options like an *escape room*, *bowling*, or a *cooking class*. Aim for an event in **August**. Gather team preferences.

items.subject: Onboard New Software Engineer
items.description: Facilitate the **onboarding process** for the new software engineer, **David Lee**. Provide necessary access to systems, introduce to the team, and assign initial tasks. Refer to the [Onboarding Checklist](https://example.com/onboarding-checklist).

items.subject: Budget Planning for Q4 2025
items.description: Begin **budget planning** for **Q4 2025**. Review departmental spending from previous quarters and project future expenses. Submit initial draft by **July 25th**.

items.subject: Research Competitor Marketing Strategies
items.description: Analyze the **marketing strategies** of our top three competitors: *CompeteCo*, *InnovateCorp*, and *MarketMovers*. Focus on their **social media presence**, **content marketing**, and **ad campaigns**. Prepare a summary report.

items.subject: Customer Onboarding Documentation
items.description: Write comprehensive documentation for **customer onboarding**. Cover steps from *account creation* to *first purchase*. Include screenshots and FAQs. Target audience: new users and support staff.

items.subject: Set up Database for Inventory Management
items.description: Configure the **PostgreSQL database** schema for **inventory management**. Include tables for *products*, *stock levels*, and *suppliers*. Consider normalization to avoid data redundancy. See [Database Schema ERD](https://example.com/db-erd).

items.subject: Design UI for Product Catalog
items.description: Create high-fidelity mockups and wireframes for the **product catalog display**. Focus on **user experience** and **mobile responsiveness**. Get feedback from the design team by **Friday**.

items.subject: Develop API Endpoints for User Management
items.description: Start implementing **RESTful API endpoints** for *user creation*, *retrieval*, *update*, and *deletion*. Ensure proper **authentication** and **authorization** mechanisms are in place. Refer to the [API Design Document v2.0](https://example.com/api-design-v2).

items.subject: Backup important files
items.description: Perform a backup of all important files to the **External HDD**. Last backup was on **July 1, 2025**.

items.subject: Schedule dentist appointment
items.description: Call **Dr. Smith's** office to schedule a **routine check-up**. Aim for an appointment next month.

items.subject: Learn new recipe
items.description: Try cooking **Pasta Carbonara** , an **Italian** dish, this evening. Look up a reliable recipe online.#Ref:Untitled.jpg

items.subject: Water plants
items.description: Remember to **daily** water the plants on the **Balcony**. Check the soil moisture before watering.

items.subject: Review code changes
items.description: Review **Pull Request ID 12345** from **Jane Doe**. Ensure the code meets quality standards and functionality.

items.subject: Clean the apartment
items.description: Give the **Living Room** a good **medium-priority** cleaning. Vacuum, dust, and tidy up.

items.subject: Plan weekend getaway
items.description: Start planning a weekend getaway to **Goa** around **August 10, 2025**. Check for flight and accommodation options.

items.subject: Research new framework
items.description: Conduct **high-priority** research on **React Native** for the new mobile application. Look into its performance and community support.

items.subject: todo-demo markdown
items.description:
Here’s a **comprehensive** Markdown sample that touches on *most* features supported by [marked.js](https://marked.js.org), structured with examples and comments. You can paste this into a `.md` file or Markdown live editor to preview. --- # 1. Headings # H1 ## H2 ### H3 #### H4 ##### H5 ###### H6 --- # 2. Emphasis This is *italic*, **bold**, and ***bold italic***. Also: __bold__ and _italic_. --- # 3. Blockquotes > A single-line blockquote. > > > Nested blockquote. > > > - And a nested list inside. --- # 4. Lists - Unordered list item - Nested UNS list 1. Mixed with ordered 2. Second nested ordered - Back to top list 1. Ordered list item 2. Another one - Nested unorder under ordered 1. Another deep level ordered --- # 5. Code ## 5a. Inline code Use `const x = 5;` in your code. ## 5b. Fenced code block with syntax highlighting (JS) ```js // Hello world function greet(name) { console.log(`Hello, ${name}!`); } greet('marked.js'); ``` --- ## 5c. Indented code block (4 spaces) ``` This is an indented code block. It preserves whitespace. ``` --- # 6. Horizontal Rules --- Or: --- Or: --- --- # 7. Links and Images [OpenAI website](https://openai.com) [Relative link example](./some-local-file.md) ![Alt text image example](https://via.placeholder.com/150 "Optional Title") --- # 8. Tables | Feature | Support | Notes | | ----------- | :-----: | ------------------------- | | Tables | ✔️ | Align columns | | Code blocks | ✔️ | Indented or fenced | | Links | ✔️ | Inline or reference style | | Emojis | ✔️ | 😄 | --- # 9. Task Lists * [x] Write spec * [ ] Implement feature * [ ] Test thoroughly --- # 10. Strikethrough ~~This was wrong, now fixed.~~ --- # 11. Inline HTML
HTML block works too! Bold inside HTML
--- # 12. Emojis I ❤️ Markdown, and I love using emojis like \:smile: :+1: \:rocket: --- # 13. Footnotes Here’s a statement with a footnote.[^1] [^1]: This is the footnote explanation. --- # 14. Emoji Shortcodes (if enabled) \:sparkles: \:tada: :100: --- # 15. Definition Lists (GFM-extended) Term 1 : Definition for term 1. Term 2 : Definition for term 2. : Another definition paragraph for term 2. --- # 16. Autolinks [https://github.com](https://github.com) --- # 17. Escaping Use a backslash to escape Markdown characters: \*not italic\* $not a link$ --- # 18. Markdown inside blockquotes > ### Quoted heading > > 1. Quoted list item 1 > 2. Quoted list item 2 > > **Bold text** inside a quote. --- # 19. Mixed Content 1. List with embedded code: ```python def foo(): return "bar" ``` 2. Following paragraph after code in list. --- # 20. Reference-style Links [Google][1] and [Bing][2]. [1]: https://google.com "Google Search" [2]: https://bing.com "Bing Search" --- # 21. Nested Lists with Different Types * Bullet 1. Numbered * Another bullet 2. Continue numbered --- # 22. HTML Comments (won’t display) --- ### End of Test Document ``` --- ### ✅ How to test it - Paste into a `.md` file and open with a Markdown viewer/editor that uses **marked.js**. - You’ll see headings 1–6, emphasis styles, blockquotes (including nested), unordered and ordered lists (with nesting), inline & fenced code blocks (JS + Python), horizontal rules, links (inline, relative, autolinks), images (with alt/title), tables, task lists, strikethrough, inline HTML, emojis, footnotes, definition lists, escaping, reference-style links, nested list types, and HTML comments. Let me know if you want to explore any feature in more depth! ```

items.subject: Read 'Dune'
items.description: Continue reading *Dune*. Currently on **Chapter 5**, approximately **300 pages left**. Aim to finish at least one chapter.

items.subject: Gym Workout1
items.description: Today's workout: **Cardio** for **60 minutes**. Focus on a good warm-up and cool-down.

items.subject: Prepare for presentation
items.description: Finish the **Q3 Sales Report presentation**. Aim for **15 concise slides**. Practice your delivery.

items.subject: Call Mom
items.description: Give mom a call around **7 PM IST**. Ask her about her day and the upcoming family dinner.

items.subject: Grocery Shopping
items.description: Need to pick up **milk**, **eggs**, **bread**, and **fruits** from the Local Mart. Don't forget the **organic yogurt**!

items.subject: Complete project proposal
items.description: Finalize **project scope**, **timeline**, and **budget** for the new initiative. Remember to include the [Q3 Sales Report](https://example.com/q3-report) data.
